divs: Sighting DetailsWe have had multiple sightings of orange red pulsing ufo's over multiple evenings. The first night there was 14 in the sky at the same time. On the 4th in new britian ct we saw 6 in the sky at the same time. On the 23rd there were 3 in the sky very close to the house huge pulsing red and orange making no noise at all. I live in the flight path to BDL airport in hartford and know exactly what a jet and private plane look like in the sky these are 20-30x the size of the planes. Planes going to bradley typically take a direct diagonal line over our house every day every night. This night after the sighting the plance took a 90 degree angle around the air space above our house immediatley after the sighting. I am very curious to find out what your thoughts are on what is happening here in ct.
